position: Risk analyst at Piramal | CFA L1 cleared | IIT Kharagpur 2022

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: ◦ Hand detection: Retrained the YOLO hand detector model that tracks the hand and its movements in the interview using the Egohands dataset. Increased the accuracy by 17% and added new features to the detector to make it more robust.◦ Question Answer Feature extraction: Built a QA feature extractor with LSTM model using in house data to extract features of questions asked in interviews and their answers to improve the quality of questions and answers in interviews.◦ Informal and Formal Suit detection: Analyzed Fashionpedia and DeepFashion2 datasets to extract useful main garment attributes and accessories to map them to various formal and informal interview attires for female candidates.

experience.title: Model risk analyst
experience.description: ◦ Performed complete validation of Economic Risk Capital (ERC) model for the US and Europe Middle Market Loan portfolio.◦ Critically analyzed the model performance through materiality, shock calibration, model implementation, and back-testing.◦ Assessed the model limitations, model monitoring, and governance and presented my final findings in the validation report.
experience.description_html: ◦ Performed complete validation of Economic Risk Capital (ERC) model for the US and Europe Middle Market Loan portfolio.◦ Critically analyzed the model performance through materiality, shock calibration, model implementation, and back-testing.◦ Assessed the model limitations, model monitoring, and governance and presented my final findings in the validation report. <!---->

experience.title: Computer vision and Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: ◦ Built a face recognition model using the Viola-Jones algorithm. Used Haar-cascade classifier to detect various facial properties.◦ Trained the CNN model to predict gender and age group of customers with an accuracy of 72.3% for age and 85.2% for gender.
experience.description_html: ◦ Built a face recognition model using the Viola-Jones algorithm. Used Haar-cascade classifier to detect various facial properties.◦ Trained the CNN model to predict gender and age group of customers with an accuracy of 72.3% for age and 85.2% for gender. <!---->

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: ◦ Developed a tool using Python to extract and process the data from the Household Consumption Expenditure surveys 2019.◦ Assessed the PLFS surveys conducted in 2017 and noted the dynamics in labor force participation and their dependencies.◦ Developed a regression model to predict MPCE in reference periods with 83.25% accuracy which was widely used during 2020.
